#summary checkBoxTag(name,value,checked[label,wrapLabel,prepend,append,prependToLabel,appendToLabel])
#labels chapter,0.9.1

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a check box form control based on the supplied `name`.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true || - || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *value* || string || true || - || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *checked* || string || true || false || Whether or not this is check box is initially selected ||
|| *label* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *wrapLabel* || boolean || false || true || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *prepend* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *append* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *prependToLabel* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *appendToLabel* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` |||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#checkBoxTag(name="suscribe", value="true", label="Suscribe to our newsletter", checked=false)#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
